titles.title: Providing for the concurrence by the House with amendments in the amendments of the Senate to H.R. 1499.

action.text: Mr. Johnson, Sam moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 803.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 412 - 0 (Roll no. 128).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/9/2006--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendment to H.R. 1499 (Heroes Earned Retirement Opportunities Act).
